attributes.action: We need to change our England kit back to the normal St George’s cross
attributes.additional_details: Because you can’t change your countries flag
attributes.background: They need to change it back to the way the St George’s Cross used to be

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
